title: What are the best BTS interviews? - Quora

response.answer_text: Access Interview: The interviewer was really professional, respectful, witty, and he had a positive attitude and good chemistry with the BTS members. Also, the members’ answers were hilarious!  Buzzfeed Celeb Interview: The members’ answers and reactions were just hilarious in this video!  PeopleTV Interview: Once again, the answers to the questions were so funny! Tae loving Panda Express and the story of J-Hope getting the bronze medal when there were only three teams will crack you up so much!  Buzzfeed Celeb Interview: "Start stage ... My heart ... boom boom" - Jungkook 2017. That’s all I have to say lmao  J-14 Magazine Interview: This interviewer was seriously so good. It wasn't awkward/uncomfortable, the questions were interesting, the interviewer seemed truly interested in them, he congratulated them so much, and he did his research!  LIVE 101.5 Phoenix Interview: “BTS is the best, yea, BTS is the best!” BTS with the Mess, gonna get some Panda Express! Ok, I’m sorry. I’ll stop now lol  Ellen Interview: Ellen: “Have you ever dated a fan?” V: “Not”; Taehyung's "Not!" is seriously so iconic. I'm still wheezing! Ellen’s scare prank on BTS was also iconic. Jin shivered so much and Jhope literally fell off the couch!   104.3 MYfm Interview: BTS singing Shape of You by Ed Sheeran: “TONG TING TONG TONG TING TONG TONG TING TONG TONG TING TONG HUWAHUWAHUWAHUWA!!!”  Jimmy Fallon Interview: The interview and Fortnite dance challenge videos were so funny. Jimin is actually Jimmy Fallon’s bias! “Once you jimin you can’t jimout.”   Ask Anything Chat Interview: BTS speaking English in this interview crack me up every time! "Ah I love Hamburger... and sprite," "I put sticker on my carrier," "wE hAvE dIfFeReNt ClOtHeS"  Access Interview: This interview was where "I know her face but I don't know her name," the iconic line by Jungkook, was born!  And just a funny video of BTS interviews!!!

Sometimes Quora takes down answers if they have links in them, so I won’t be linking them here. But they’re all easily found on Youtube :) Firstly, one of my ALL TIME FAVOURITE western interviews with BTS - The Zach Sang Show interview. This was around the time of the first big Western buzz around BTS. Most Western interviews went along the lines of, ‘wHo iS yOuR CelEbRiTY cRUsH?’ (super uncomfortable for the boys and almost unwatchable). However, Zach’s interview was a breath of fresh air! Zach asks meaningful questions, the boys seem very comfortable, and in general it’s a very respectful and genuine interview. Zach even talks about their UNIEF endeavours, and Namjoon thanks him, saying he’s the first one to mention this. Search on Youtube: ‘BTS Backstage at the AMAs Zach Sang Show’ Secondly, and these are ones I cannot recommend enough, both of the Liam McEwan interviews for J-14 Magazine. Like Zach, Liam brings genuine sincerity and thoughtfulness to his interviews, and you can see so clearly how happy the boys are in both of Liam’s interviews. He has the perfect mix of humour, and more serious questions. Search on Youtube: ‘J-14 BTS Gets Real About Their New Album’Search on Youtube: ‘J-14 BTS International Success, Music, Charity’ The next one is on the other end of the scale, but still as enjoyable to watch. BTS with the Mess! Chaotic, energetic, and full of laughs. This isn’t in any way a serious interview, but it’s so heartwarming to watch the boys relax and laugh with the animated hosts, and even learn a new dance move with them. In particular, Tae really enjoys this one. He’s almost in tears from laughing so much. Search on Youtube: ‘Watch BTS Band Members Profess Their Love For Usher, Zedd and More!’ An “interview” that’s completely different for the others I’ve mentioned so far - a comeback interview hosted by Jungkook himself, for Blood Sweat and Tears. This is absolutely ridiculous and so fun to watch. The members keep setting each other off laughing - they test Suga’s needlework, make Jin cry on demand, show off the rapline’s singing abilities, and more. I don’t know whether you can count this as an interview or not, but it’s hilarious and definitely deserves a spot on this list. Search on Youtube: ‘161025 The Show News BTS part 1 [ENG SUB]’Search on Youtube: ‘161025 The Show News BTS part 2 [ENG SUB]’ This last one’s short and sweet, but probably my favourite ‘mainstream TV’ interview that they’ve done so far: The Tonight Show with Jimmy Fallon. Jimin and Jimmy are adorable, all the members’ styling is top-notch, Jimmy has great chemistry with the boys and overall, I was really impressed considering it was a mainstream interview. They managed to cover the important things in the time they had, and it was very very watchable (unlike some other interviews they’re had on TV). Jimmy really made the boys feel at home. Search on Youtube: ‘Jimmy Interviews the Biggest Boy Band on the Planet BTS’ I’ll add more if I think of any!
